required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: qCTG and Doppler Ultrasound in the Detection of Hypoxia Among FGR Fetuses
clinical_study.official_title: Quantitative Cardiotocography and Doppler Ultrasound in the Detection of Hypoxia Among Growth-restricted Fetuses

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the benefits of combining Doppler measurements of placental/fetal blood vessels with computerized cardiotocography (quantitative cardiotocogrpahy - qCTG) in the detection of fetal hypoxia (pH < 7.20) among late-onset growth restricted (SGR) fetuses

intervention.description: Computerized expert system for fetal monitoring, based on cardiotocogrpaphy

responsible_party.investigator_title: Assist. Prof. Petar Ignatov, MD, Ph.D.
